name: Deermageddon
description:
For too long hunters have hunted deer. 

Now it is time for the shoe be on the other hoof, and a deer to wreck havoc on the hunters that wronged him. 

Time for Deermageddon!

Note*: Only one level, and no set win condition, but can clear the map of hunters and chill out to the music. Was also my [Hawenstien] first real attempt at a game for a game jam.
